PROFILE_SETTINGS.AFTER_EMAIL_CHANGED: Din profil er blevet opdateret. Log venligst ind igen, da dine loginoplysninger er ændret

PROFILE_SECTION.TITLE: Profil
PROFILE_SECTION.NOTE: Din e-mailadresse er din identitet og bruges til at logge ind.

SEND_MESSAGE.TITLE: Genvejstast til at sende beskeder
SEND_MESSAGE.NOTE: You can select a hotkey (either Enter or Cmd/Ctrl+Enter) based on your preference of writing.

ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Enter (↵)
ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages by pressing Enter key instead of clicking the send button.

CMD_ENTER_KEY.HEADING: Cmd/Ctrl + Enter (⌘ + ↵)
CMD_ENTER_KEY.CONTENT: Send messages by pressing Cmd/Ctrl + enter key instead of clicking the send button.

INTERFACE_SECTION.TITLE: Interface
INTERFACE_SECTION.NOTE: Customize the look and feel of your Chatwoot dashboard.

FONT_SIZE.TITLE: Font size
FONT_SIZE.NOTE: Adjust the text size across the dashboard based on your preference.
FONT_SIZE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your font settings have been updated successfully
FONT_SIZE.UPDATE_ERROR: There is an error while updating the font settings, please try again

LANGUAGE.TITLE: Preferred Language
LANGUAGE.NOTE: Choose the language you want to use.
LANGUAGE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your Language settings have been updated successfully
LANGUAGE.UPDATE_ERROR: There is an error while updating the language settings, please try again

MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.TITLE: Personlig beskedsignatur
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.NOTE: Create a unique message signature to appear at the end of every message you send from any inbox. You can also include an inline image, which is supported in live-chat, email, and API inboxes.
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.API_ERROR: Kunne ikke gemme signatur! Prøv igen
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.IMAGE_UPLOAD_SUCCESS: Image added successfully. Please click on save to save the signature
MESSAGE_SIGNATURE_SECTION.IMAGE_UPLOAD_SIZE_ERROR: Billedets størrelse skal være mindre end {size}MB

PASSWORD_SECTION.TITLE: Adgangskode
PASSWORD_SECTION.NOTE: Opdatering af din adgangskode vil nulstille dine logins på flere enheder.

SECURITY_SECTION.TITLE: Security
SECURITY_SECTION.NOTE: Manage additional security features for your account.

ACCESS_TOKEN.TITLE: Adgangs Token
ACCESS_TOKEN.NOTE: Denne token kan bruges, hvis du bygger en API-baseret integration
ACCESS_TOKEN.RESET_ERROR: Unable to regenerate access token. Please try again

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Audio Alerts
AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.NOTE: Enable audio alerts in dashboard for new messages and conversations.

ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NONE: You haven't selected any options, you won't receive any audio alerts.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for conversations assigned to you.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for any unassigned conversations.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NOTME: You'll receive alerts for conversations assigned to others.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for your assigned conversations and any unattended ones.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+NOTME: You'll receive alerts for conversations assigned to you and to others, but not for unassigned ones.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.NOTME+UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for unattended conversations and those assigned to others.
ALERT_COMBINATIONS.ASSIGNED+NOTME+UNASSIGNED: You'll receive alerts for all conversations.

CONDITIONS.TITLE: Alert conditions:
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_ONE: Send audio alerts only if the browser window is not active
CONDITIONS.CONDITION_TWO: Send alerts every 30s until all the assigned conversations are read

AUDIO_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SOUND_PERMISSION_ERROR: Autoplay is disabled in your browser. To hear alerts automatically, enable sound permission in your browser settings or interact with the page.

EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: E-Mail Notifikationer
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Send e-mail notifikationer når en samtale er tildelt mig
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Send e-mail notifikationer når en ny samtale er oprettet
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Send e-mail notifikationer, når du er nævnt i en samtale
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send e-mail notifikationer når en ny besked er oprettet i en tildelt samtale
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send email notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: Send email notifications when a conversation misses first response SLA
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: Send email notifications when a conversation misses next response SLA
EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_RESOLUTION: Send email notifications when a conversation misses resolution SLA

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notification preferences

TYPES.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNED: A conversation is assigned to you
TYPES.CONVERSATION_MENTION: You are mentioned in a conversation
TYPES.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: A new message is created in an assigned conversation
TYPES.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: A new message is created in a participating conversation
TYPES.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: A conversation misses first response SLA
TYPES.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: A conversation misses next response SLA

NOTIFICATIONS.BROWSER_PERMISSION: Enable push notifications for your browser so you’re able to receive them

API.UPDATE_ERROR: Der er en fejl under opdatering af indstillingerne, prøv venligst igen

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.TITLE: Push Notifikationer
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNMENT: Send push-notifikationer, når en samtale er tildelt mig
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_CREATION: Send push-notifikationer, når en ny samtale er oprettet
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.CONVERSATION_MENTION: Send push-notifikationer, når du er nævnt i en samtale
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.ASSIGNED_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send push-notifikationer, når en ny besked oprettes i en tildelt samtale
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.PARTICIPATING_CONVERSATION_NEW_MESSAGE: Send push notifications when a new message is created in a participating conversation
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.HAS_ENABLED_PUSH: Du har aktiveret push for denne browser.
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_FIRST_RESPONSE: Send push notifications when a conversation misses first response SLA
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_NEXT_RESPONSE: Send push notifications when a conversation misses next response SLA
PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS_SECTION.SLA_MISSED_RESOLUTION: Send push notifications when a conversation misses resolution SLA

APP_GLOBAL.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_PENDING: It seems that you haven't verified your email address yet. Please check your inbox for the verification email.
APP_GLOBAL.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_SENT: Verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.

ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.TITLE: Konto Suspenderet
ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED.MESSAGE: Din konto er suspenderet. Gå ud til supportteamet for mere information.

NO_ACCOUNTS.MESSAGE_CLOUD: You are not part of any accounts right now. If you think this is a mistake, please reach out to our support team.
NO_ACCOUNTS.MESSAGE_SELF_HOSTED: You are not part of any accounts right now. Please reach out to your administrator.

SET_AUTO_OFFLINE.INFO_SHORT: Automatically mark offline when you aren't using the app.

BILLING_SETTINGS.TITLE: Fakturering
BILLING_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Manage your subscription here, upgrade your plan and get more for your team.

CURRENT_PLAN.TITLE: Nuværende Abonnement
CURRENT_PLAN.PLAN_NOTE: Du abonnerer i øjeblikket på **{plan}** planen med **{quantity}** licenser

MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.TITLE: Administrer dit abonnement
MANAGE_SUBSCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: Se dine tidligere fakturaer, rediger dine fakturaoplysninger eller annuller dit abonnement.

CAPTAIN.TITLE: Captain
CAPTAIN.DESCRIPTION: Manage usage and credits for Captain AI.
CAPTAIN.UPGRADE: Captain is not available on the free plan, upgrade now to get access to assistants, copilot and more.

CHAT_WITH_US.TITLE: Brug for hjælp?
CHAT_WITH_US.DESCRIPTION: Har du problemer med fakturering? Vi er her for at hjælpe.

BILLING_SETTINGS.NO_BILLING_USER: Din faktureringskonto er ved at blive konfigureret. Opdater venligst siden og prøv igen.

TOPUP.MODAL_DESCRIPTION: Purchase additional credits for Captain AI.
TOPUP.NOTE_DESCRIPTION: Credits are added immediately and expire in 6 months. An active subscription is required to use credits. Purchased credits are consumed after your monthly plan credits.
TOPUP.FETCH_ERROR: Failed to load credit options. Please try again.
TOPUP.PURCHASE_ERROR: Failed to process purchase. Please try again.
TOPUP.PURCHASE_SUCCESS: Successfully added {credits} credits to your account

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm Purchase
CONFIRM.DESCRIPTION: You are about to purchase {credits} credits for {amount}.
CONFIRM.INSTANT_DEDUCTION_NOTE: Your saved card will be charged immediately upon confirmation.

SECURITY_SETTINGS.TITLE: Security
SECURITY_SETTINGS.SAML_DISABLED_MESSAGE: SAML SSO is currently disabled. Please contact your administrator to enable this feature.

SAML.TITLE: SAML SSO
SAML.NOTE: Configure SAML single sign-on for your account. Users will authenticate through your identity provider instead of using email/password.

ACS_URL.LABEL: ACS URL
ACS_URL.TOOLTIP: Assertion Consumer Service URL - Configure this URL in your IdP as the destination for SAML responses

SSO_URL.LABEL: SSO URL
SSO_URL.HELP: The URL where SAML authentication requests will be sent

CERTIFICATE.LABEL: Signing certificate in PEM format
CERTIFICATE.HELP: The public certificate from your identity provider used to verify SAML responses

FINGERPRINT.LABEL: Fingerprint
FINGERPRINT.TOOLTIP: SHA-1 fingerprint of the certificate - Use this to verify the certificate in your IdP configuration

SAML.COPY_SUCCESS: Kode kopieret til udklipsholder med succes

SP_ENTITY_ID.LABEL: SP Entity ID
SP_ENTITY_ID.HELP: Unique identifier for this application as a service provider (auto-generated).
SP_ENTITY_ID.TOOLTIP: Unique identifier for Chatwoot as the Service Provider - Configure this in your IdP settings

IDP_ENTITY_ID.LABEL: Identity Provider Entity ID
IDP_ENTITY_ID.HELP: Unique identifier for your identity provider (usually found in IdP configuration)

VALIDATION.REQUIRED_FIELDS: SSO URL, Identity Provider Entity ID, and Certificate are required fields
VALIDATION.SSO_URL_ERROR: Please enter a valid SSO URL
VALIDATION.IDP_ENTITY_ID_ERROR: Identity Provider Entity ID is required

ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.AVAILABLE_ON: The SAML SSO feature is only available in the Enterprise plans.
ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.UPGRADE_PROMPT: Upgrade to an Enterprise plan to access SAML single sign-on and other advanced security features.
ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.ASK_ADMIN: Please reach out to your administrator for the upgrade.

PAYWALL.TITLE: Upgrade to enable SAML SSO
PAYWALL.AVAILABLE_ON: The SAML SSO feature is only available in the Enterprise plans.
PAYWALL.UPGRADE_PROMPT: Upgrade your plan to get access to SAML single sign-on and other advanced features.
PAYWALL.CANCEL_ANYTIME: You can change or cancel your plan anytime

ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING.TITLE: SAML Attribute Setup
ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: The following attribute mappings must be configured in your identity provider

INFO_SECTION.TITLE: Service Provider Information
INFO_SECTION.TOOLTIP: Copy these values and configure them in your Identity Provider to establish the SAML connection

CREATE_ACCOUNT.NO_ACCOUNT_WARNING: Uh oh! Vi kunne ikke finde nogen Chatwoot-konti. Opret venligst en ny konto for at fortsætte.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Kunne ikke oprette forbindelse til Woot Server, Prøv igen senere

TITLE.MOVE_TO_NEXT_TAB: Flyt til næste fane i samtalelisten

HEADER.TITLE: Agent assignment
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: Define policies to effectively manage workload and route conversations based on the needs of inboxes and agents. Learn more here

ASSIGNMENT_POLICY.TITLE: Assignment policy
ASSIGNMENT_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Manage how conversations get assigned in inboxes.
FEATURES: Assign by conversations evenly or by available capacity
Add fair distribution rules to avoid overloading any agent
Add inboxes to a policy - one policy per inbox

AGENT_CAPACITY_POLICY.TITLE: Agent capacity policy
FEATURES: Create exceptions based on labels and time
Add agents to a policy - one policy per agent

CONFIRM_ADD_INBOX_DIALOG.TITLE: Add inbox
CONFIRM_ADD_INBOX_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: {inboxName} inbox is already linked to another policy. Are you sure you want to link it to this policy? It will be unlinked from the other policy.

ADD.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add inbox to policy

REMOVE.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to remove inbox from policy

BALANCED.LABEL: Balanced
BALANCED.DESCRIPTION: Assign conversations based on available capacity.

EARLIEST_CREATED.LABEL: Earliest created
EARLIEST_CREATED.DESCRIPTION: The conversation that was created first gets assigned first.

LONGEST_WAITING.LABEL: Longest waiting
LONGEST_WAITING.DESCRIPTION: The conversation waiting the longest gets assigned first.

FAIR_DISTRIBUTION.LABEL: Fair distribution policy
FAIR_DISTRIBUTION.DESCRIPTION: Set the maximum number of conversations that can be assigned per agent within a time window to avoid overloading any one agent. This required field defaults to 100 conversations per hour.

INBOXES.LABEL: Added inboxes
INBOXES.DESCRIPTION: Add inboxes for which this policy will be applicable.

DROPDOWN.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search and select inboxes to add

INBOXES.EMPTY_STATE: No inboxes added to this policy, add an inbox to get started

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add inbox to policy
Failed to create agent capacity policy

CONFIRM_ADD_AGENT_DIALOG.TITLE: Add agent
CONFIRM_ADD_AGENT_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: {agentName} is already linked to another policy. Are you sure you want to link it to this policy? It will be unlinked from the other policy.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to update agent capacity policy

ADD.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add agent to policy

REMOVE.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to remove agent from policy

EXCLUSION_RULES.LABEL: Exclusion rules
EXCLUSION_RULES.DESCRIPTION: Conversations that satisfy the following conditions would not count towards agent capacity

TAGS.LABEL: Exclude conversations tagged with specific labels

DROPDOWN.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search and select tags to add

TAGS.EMPTY_STATE: No tags added to this policy.

DURATION.LABEL: Exclude conversations older than a specified duration

USERS.LABEL: Assigned agents
USERS.DESCRIPTION: Add agents for which this policy will be applicable.

DROPDOWN.SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search and select agents to add

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to add agent to policy

DELETE_POLICY.ERROR_MESSAGE: Failed to delete agent capacity policy

DELETE_POLICY.TITLE: Delete policy
DELETE_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this policy? This action cannot be undone.
